1011001000111101 0100111001100010 0 -> sum: 0000000010011111, cout: 1
0010101000000011 1111111111000101 0 -> sum: 0010100111001000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
